name: Language
title: Google
Cloud
Translate
Language
description:
Language

Represents a supported languages query result. Returned by Google::Cloud::Translate::Api#languages.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/translate"

translate = Google::Cloud::Translate.new

languages = translate.languages "en"

languages.size #=> 104
languages[0].code #=> "af"
languages[0].name #=> "Afrikaans"

methods.name: code
title: Google
Cloud
Translate
Language#code
methods.description: The language code. This is an ISO 639-1 language code.

methods.name: name
title: Google
Cloud
Translate
Language#name
methods.description: The localized name of the language, if available.
